Package: org.ajoberstar.gradle.git.release.base

[Groovy] Class ReleaseVersion

    • org.ajoberstar.gradle.git.release.base.ReleaseVersion

    • Represents an inferred version and any related metadata to be used after the inference.

      • Properties Summary

          Properties 
          Type Name and description
          boolean  createTag
          Whether or not to create a tag for the release.
          java.lang.String  previousVersion
          The latest version, as determined by the strategy's logic.
          java.lang.String  version
          The version that should be used by the project.
